New Records: LeBron James became the first player in league history to play a game in his teens and in his 40s
Key Match Events: Jarrett Allen scored 27 points and grabbed 14 rebounds
Anthony Davis scored 28 points and grabbed 13 rebounds
Austin Reaves led the Lakers with an impressive near-triple-double of 35 points, nine rebounds and 10 assists
Post-Match Reflections: James, whose four NBA titles include a 2016 championship with his hometown team Cleveland, scored 23 points with four rebounds, seven assists and a blocked shot
It was his first game since his 40th birthday on Monday
Miscellaneous Highlights: There was less drama in Boston, where the Celtics won by the second-largest margin of victory in franchise history â€“ trailing only their 56-point triumph at Chicago in December 2018
Jayson Tatum scored 18 of his 23 points in the third quarter, when the Celtics outscored the Raptors 45-18 to effectively put the game out of reach
Payton Pritchard scored 19 points off the bench as seven Celtics players scored in double figures
